improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: API Ninjas Whois API endpoint. Lightning-fast lookups for top-tier domains (e.g. google.com, microsoft.com) - get instant access to registration details, name servers, and more. For less popular or generic domains, use our other WHOIS endpoints (newly_registered_domains_whois, domain_whois_lookup_api_domain_name).
name: best_whois_for_top_tier_v2
